Texts.Eng: The core you brought me won't do anything unless it's wired up using Thelean wiring, so I need you to gather some samples for me. Hunt down some Theleans or Violated Droden and Drahl, and bring me ^orange;4 Thelean Tendrils ^white; and ^orange;5 Thelean Metal Fragments^white;.
With these samples, I can finish constructing the weapon... Here you go, Captain! Just be careful with that thing, alright?
